thread.title: A soldier's epic journey captured in sculpture for U.S. World War One memorial

title: A soldier's epic journey captured in sculpture for U.S. World War One memorial

organizations.name: view transcript  new york academy of art

text:
A soldier's epic journey captured in sculpture for U.S. World War One memorial Wednesday, March 21, 2018 - 02:18 
New York Academy of Art unveils Sabin Howard's 10-foot scale cast resin model of ''A Soldier's Journey,'' on display from March 20-23. Rough Cut
